name: Kicking Kittens: Putin Saves The World
description: Aliens are invading! Your intelligence agency has informed you of a sinister alien plot. Aliens are invading with robots disguised as kittens to sneak into Russia and launch its nuclear payload. Don't let them start World War III, stop the alien robot kittens from reaching the nuclear launch button and save the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or Better Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
